description:
The Harvest Show is a concert where all of the different grains show off their beauty to everyone watching, and HarveStars is the name given to the grains who put on the best performances. In this modern age of rice acreage reduction policies and Westernization of eating habits, bread has become the most popular grain in Japan, and dinner tables are dominated by Yeast King, the bread HarveStars. But five new rice students have enrolled at Kokuritsu Inaho Academy, a school on the verge of shutting down, and they form a new group called Love Rice that`s practicing to beat Yeast King at the Harvest Show and win back the popularity rice once had...
Source: crunchyroll

REGULAR.description:
Somewhere in Japan is the historical school for grains, Inaho Academy. A new student there, Hinohikari, learns at the opening ceremony that the school is about to be shut down, and the only way to stop it is to beat out the bread. With that in mind, Hinohikari declares his intention in front of the whole school to become a HarveStar that surpasses even the alumni group Five Grain Rice...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Newest Crop of Students Is Here?

REGULAR.description:
Hinohikari has decided to enter the Harvest Festival in order to start not a rice boom, but a rice riot. He asks Nikomaru, Akitakomachi, Hitomebore, Sasanishiki, and Chinkobozu to join him, but none of them are willing. Finally Nikomaru can`t bear to watch anymore and offers him a surprising suggestion, but can Hinohikari bring himself to take him up on it?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ニコニコ笑顔じゃいられない

REGULAR.description:
Hinohikari had just grown accustomed to being a member of Nikomaru and Akitakomachi`s HarveStar unit, "Blend Mine," when the subject of Akitakomachi`s past comes up and they stumble upon a fatal flaw in Blend Mine. So the new unit name suggested by Hinohikari after he had saved it up—no, kept it warm—for a long time is "Love Rice." Meanwhile, Sasanishiki watches the three of them from afar...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Futsuu no Taue wa Mou Akita
I`ve Had Enough of the Usual Rice Planting
普通の田植えはもうあきた

REGULAR.description:
The three members of Love Rice are training when they spot Hitomebore hitting on someone. After seeing him so persistently trying to pick up a date even in the middle of a blizzard, Hinohikari asks him to join Love Rice, but Hitomebore says he has plans to become a comedian with Chinkobozu. Then he takes off, saying he has a date, and the Love Rice members follow him to find...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Love at First Sight with Hitomebore
そんなお前にひとめぼれ

REGULAR.description:
Sasanishiki continues to refuse the invitations to join Love Rice. Then, for some reason, there`s suddenly a train track running through the school yard, and a dog is trapped on the track as a train rushes toward it. Love Rice is frozen in place, but Sasanishiki rushes forward. Sasanishiki`s skill and drive when it comes to Harvest Shows was once said to rival Koshihikari himself, but the story Morinokuma begins to tell about his past is one nobody expected...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kokyou ni Nishiki o Kazaru no Da
Sasanishiki Is Going Home a Hero

REGULAR.description:
The five members of Love Rice are both excited and focused as they look ahead to their Harvest Festival appearance. Then An, Shokku, and Kyari, the hottest HarveStars from the Sacred Bread High School, arrive on the scene. After seeing their far superior Harvest Show, the girls who once cheered for Love Rice turn their attention to Yeast King.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: それゆけイーストキング

REGULAR.description:
The five members of Love Rice are both excited and focused as they look ahead to their Harvest Festival appearance. Then An, Shokku, and Kyari, the hottest HarveStars from the Sacred Bread High School, arrive on the scene. After seeing their far superior Harvest Show, the girls who once cheered for Love Rice turn their attention to Yeast King.
Source: crunchyroll

After feeling stimulated by Blast Resistance`s concert, the members of Love Rice try to work on some new moves, but they can`t seem to master the perfect technique. As they`re left confused and frustrated, Koshihikari, the leader of Five Grain Rice and an alumnus of Inaho Academy, appears before them. Hinohikari, a HarveStar otaku, is enthralled to see his idol standing in front of him, but for the sake of Love Rice, he gets serious about undergoing Koshihikari`s rigorous training...
Source: crunchyroll

Hinohikari and Nikomaru sneak into St. Pan High School to scope it out. They end up being caught by Yeast King`s homeroom teacher, Crois, but Yeast King puts on their Harvest Show anyway, as if inviting the two of them to check out the competition. After witnessing the overwhelming difference in skill between their two groups, Hinohikari and Nikomaru can`t help but respect their rivals. Then Crois comes up with a plan...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Pan wa Pan demo Kuenai Pan
パンはパンでも食えないパン

REGULAR.description:
Love Rice arrives at the Harvest Festival with the goal of starting a rice riot with their performance, which they haven`t once completed successfully in practice yet. Then Hinohikari tells the other members the reason he decided to become a HarveStar. But then the mood is broken when Hitomebore receives a phone call... Who`s behind this?!
Source: crunchyroll

Love Rice arrives at the Harvest Festival with the goal of starting a rice riot with their performance, which they haven`t once completed successfully in practice yet. Then Hinohikari tells the other members the reason he decided to become a HarveStar. But then the mood is broken when Hitomebore receives a phone call... Who`s behind this?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: やっと出たちんこ坊主

REGULAR.description:
Love Rice managed to overcome their crisis thanks to Chinkobozu`s Harvest Show. Rain suddenly started to fall as Love Rice made their return to the Harvest Festival venue. Will the wishes of Hinohikari, Sasanishiki, Hitomebore, Akitakomachi, and Nikomaru to restore the popularity of rice and keep the school open be granted? Can rice defeat bread? This emotional Love Kome-dy is about to reach its conclusion!
Love Rice is forced to begin their Harvest Show without Hitomebore, but Yeast King sees that they`re not performing at their full potential and stops them. The members of Yeast King feel ashamed of everything they`ve done to stand in Love Rice`s way, and even more so when they find out who was behind Hitomebore`s dilemma, so they offer to help. The desire to present their Harvest Shows fair and square leads to the sprouting of friendship between the two rival grains.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shinmai Seito wa Tsubuzuroi? Shokai Kakudai Special
新米生徒は粒ぞろい? 初回拡大スペシャル
